name: ASIST Hypothesis/Capability Registration
description: This preregistration template is part of the DARPA Artificial Social Intelligence for Successful Teams (ASIST) program. This template is intended to formally register performer hypothesis and AI capability preregistrations throughout the ASIST program.

questions.title: Study registration link
questions.description: Please provide a link to the study registration this study relies upon.

questions.title: Hypothesis/Capability Registration
questions.description: Please attach the preregistration file containing your hypothesis/capability registration details.
